mapper.sql: id, username, password, real_name, head_url, gender, email, mobile, dept_id, super_admin, last_login_date, status, creator, create_date, updater, update_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, username, password, real_name, head_url, gender, email, mobile, dept_id, super_admin, last_login_date, status, creator, create_date, updater, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{superAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
